It does not include equity (stock) compensation, cash value of retirement benefits, or the value of other non-cash benefits (e.g. healthcare). ) $14,870 - $19,124 Country: United States | Currency: USD | Updated: 4 Jul 2012 | Individuals Reporting: 291

People with the job title Fast Food Worker typically fall into one of the following PayScale standard occupations. Food Preparation Workers Perform a variety of food preparation duties other than cooking, such as preparing cold foods and shellfish, slicing meat, and brewing coffee or tea. Combined Food Preparation and Serving Workers, Including Fast Food Perform duties which combine both food preparation and food service. See Sample Job Descriptions for All Jobs

Follow Us On: The latest career advice from people with this job: Fast Food Worker Jobs How to recieve a raise Fast Food Worker - (City withheld for privacy), Pennsylvania, United States I waited 6 months and asked for a raise in a note expressing that I believed I deserved a raise and named everything that I did. In two weeks I got a 10 cent raise. It's not a lot but some people have been there 5 years and never got a raise. Posted in Negotiating Higher Pay on 22 Jun 2008 Read More Advice
